trans-unit.source: Represents a Windows rich text box control.
trans-unit.target: 表示 Windows 多格式文本框控件。

trans-unit.source: With the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox> control, the user can enter and edit text.
trans-unit.target: 与<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox>控件，用户可以输入和编辑文本。

trans-unit.source: The control also provides more advanced formatting features than the standard <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> control.
trans-unit.target: 该控件还提供更高级的格式设置功能比标准<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>控件。

trans-unit.source: Text can be assigned directly to the control, or can be loaded from a rich text format (RTF) or plain text file.
trans-unit.target: 文本可以直接分配给该控件，也可以加载从丰富文本格式 (RTF) 或纯文本文件。

trans-unit.source: The text within the control can be assigned character and paragraph formatting.
trans-unit.target: 字符和段落格式设置，可以分配控件中的文本。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox> control provides a number of properties you can use to apply formatting to any portion of text within the control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox>控件提供大量可以使用控件中的文本的任何部分应用格式设置的属性。

trans-unit.source: To change the formatting of text, it must first be selected.
trans-unit.target: 若要更改的文本格式，它必须首先选择。

trans-unit.source: Only selected text can be assigned character and paragraph formatting.
trans-unit.target: 字符和段落格式设置，可以分配仅选定的文本。

trans-unit.source: Once a setting has been made to a selected section of text, all text entered after the selection is also formatted with the same settings until a setting change is made or a different section of the control's document is selected.
trans-unit.target: 一旦对文本的选定部分进行了设置，选择输入所选内容也格式化具有相同设置，直到设置更改后的所有文本或控件的文档的其他部分。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.SelectionFont%2A> property enables you to make text bold or italic.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.SelectionFont%2A>属性使您能够将粗体或斜体的文本。

trans-unit.source: You can also use this property to change the size and typeface of the text.
trans-unit.target: 你还可以使用此属性更改的大小和文本的字样。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.SelectionColor%2A> property enables you to change the color of the text.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.SelectionColor%2A>属性使您能够更改的文本颜色。

trans-unit.source: To create bulleted lists you can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.SelectionBullet%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要创建项目符号列表，可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.SelectionBullet%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: You can also adjust paragraph formatting by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.SelectionIndent%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.SelectionRightIndent%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.SelectionHangingIndent%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 你还可以调整段落格式设置通过设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.SelectionIndent%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.SelectionRightIndent%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.SelectionHangingIndent%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox> control provides methods that provide functionality for opening and saving files.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox>控件提供提供打开和保存文件的功能的方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.LoadFile%2A> method enables you to load an existing RTF or ASCII text file into the control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.LoadFile%2A>方法使你能够加载到控件中的现有 RTF 或 ASCII 文本文件。

trans-unit.source: You can also load data from an already opened data stream.
trans-unit.target: 你也可以从已打开的数据流中加载数据。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.SaveFile%2A> enables you to save a file to RTF or ASCII text.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.SaveFile%2A>使您能够将文件保存到 RTF 或 ASCII 文本。

trans-unit.source: Similar to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.LoadFile%2A> method, you can also use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.SaveFile%2A> method to save to an open data stream.
trans-unit.target: 类似于<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.LoadFile%2A>方法，你还可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.SaveFile%2A>方法将保存到打开的数据流。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox> control also provides features for finding strings of text.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox>控件还提供了功能，用于查找的文本字符串。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.Find%2A> method is overloaded to find both strings of text as well as specific characters within the text of the control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.Find%2A>方法是重载若要查找的文本这两个字符串以及为特定字符文本中的控件。

trans-unit.source: You can also initialize the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox> control to data stored in memory.
trans-unit.target: 也可以初始化<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox>存储在内存中数据的控件。

trans-unit.source: For example, you can initialize the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.Rtf%2A> property to a string that contains the text to display, including the RTF codes that determine how the text should be formatted.
trans-unit.target: 例如，你可以初始化<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.Rtf%2A>属性包含的文本显示，包括确定应如何格式化文本的格式为 RTF 代码的字符串。

trans-unit.source: If the text within the control contains links, such as a link to a Web site, you can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.DetectUrls%2A> property to display the link appropriately in the control's text.
trans-unit.target: 如果控件中的文本包含链接，例如链接到网站，你可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.DetectUrls%2A>适当地显示链接控件的文本中的属性。

trans-unit.source: You can then handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.LinkClicked> event to perform the tasks associated with the link.
trans-unit.target: 然后可处理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.LinkClicked>事件以执行与链接相关联的任务。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.SelectionProtected%2A> property enables you to protect text within the control from manipulation by the user.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.SelectionProtected%2A>属性使您能够从用户的操作保护控件中的文本。

trans-unit.source: With protected text in your control, you can handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.Protected> event to determine when the user has attempted to modify protected text, and either alert the user that the text is protected or provide the user with a standard way to manipulate the protected text.
trans-unit.target: 与受保护的文本控件中，你可以处理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.Protected>事件，以确定当用户已尝试修改受保护的文本，并提醒用户的文本受保护或用户提供一种标准的方式来操作受保护的文本。

trans-unit.source: Applications that already use <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> controls can easily be adapted to make use of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox> controls.
trans-unit.target: 已使用的应用程序<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>控件可以轻松地进行适配以便利用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox>控件。

trans-unit.source: However, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox> control does not have the same 64K character capacity limit of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> control.
trans-unit.target: 但是，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox>控件不具有相同的 64k 字符容量限制的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>控件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox> is typically used to provide text manipulation and display features similar to word processing applications such as Microsoft Word.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox>通常用于文本操作，并显示类似于 Microsoft Word 等文字处理应用程序的功能。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.Undo%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method does not work with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyPress> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.TextChanged> events.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.Undo%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法并不适用于<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyPress>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.TextChanged>事件。

trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例创建<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox>将 RTF 文件加载到控件和"Text。 该单词的第一个实例的搜索控件

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the control will enable drag-and-drop operations.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示控件是否允许拖放操作。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if drag-and-drop is enabled in the control; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果控件中允许拖放操作，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to perform drag-and-drop operations using a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> control that contains items to drop into a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox> control.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何执行拖放操作使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>包含用于放到项的控件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox>控件。

trans-unit.source: The constructor of the form sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.AllowDrop%2A> property to `true` to enable drag-and-drop operations to occur in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox>.
trans-unit.target: 表单集的构造函数<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.AllowDrop%2A>属性`true`启用拖放操作中发生<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox>。

trans-unit.source: The example uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseDown> event of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> to start the drag operation by calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 该示例使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseDown>事件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>启动拖动操作，通过调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The example uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragEnter> event to determine if an item being dragged into the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox> is a valid data type.
trans-unit.target: 该示例使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragEnter>事件来确定是否项拖放到<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox>是有效的数据类型。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragDrop> event performs the actual dropping of a dragged item into the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox> control at the current cursor location within the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragDrop>事件执行拖动的项到实际删除<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox>内当前光标位置处的控件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox>。

trans-unit.source: This example requires that the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragDrop> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragEnter> events have been connected to the event handlers defined in the example.
trans-unit.target: 此示例需要<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragDrop>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragEnter>事件已连接到示例中定义的事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: This property is not relevant to this class.
trans-unit.target: 此属性与此类无关。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if enabled; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果已启用，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This property is not relevant to this class.
trans-unit.target: 此属性与此类无关。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether automatic word selection is enabled.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，通过该值指示是否启用自动选择字词。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if automatic word selection is enabled; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果启用自动选择字词，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: If this property is set to `true`, selecting any part of the text in the control selects the entire word.
trans-unit.target: 如果此属性设置为`true`，控件中选择任何一部分文本选择整个单词。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to create a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox> that zooms in on text, automatically selects words in the text of the control when a word is double-clicked, and has a margin on the right side of the client area of the control.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何创建<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox>，文本将放大，自动选择控件的文本中单词的单词正在双击，并且控件的客户端区域右侧边距时。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox> control has a small width, using this code will create a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox> where each character of text is displayed on its own line.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox>控件具有较小的宽度，使用此代码将创建<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox>其中每个字符的文本将显示在其对应行。

trans-unit.source: While in this vertical display position, clicking on any part of a word will select all characters of the word regardless of the fact that the text is displayed vertically.
trans-unit.target: 在此垂直显示位置上，单击某个词的任何部分将选择而不考虑垂直显示的文本的单词的所有字符。

trans-unit.source: This example requires that you have a form that contains a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox> control named `richTextBox1`.
trans-unit.target: 此示例要求你拥有一个包含窗体<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox>控件名为`richTextBox1`。

trans-unit.source: This property is not relevant to this class.
trans-unit.target: 此属性与此类无关。

trans-unit.source: The background image displayed in the control.
trans-unit.target: 在控件中显示的背景图像。

trans-unit.source: This property is not relevant to this class.
trans-unit.target: 此属性与此类无关。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.BackgroundImage" /> property changes.
trans-unit.target: 当 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.BackgroundImage" /> 属性的值更改时发生。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.target: 此属性与此类无关。

trans-unit.target: 在控件中显示的背景图像的布局。

trans-unit.source: This property is not relevant to this class.
trans-unit.target: 此属性与此类无关。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.BackgroundImageLayout" /> property changes.
trans-unit.target: 当 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.BackgroundImageLayout" /> 属性的值更改时发生。

trans-unit.target: 此事件与此类无关。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the indentation used in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox" /> control when the bullet style is applied to the text.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置对文本应用项目符号样式时，<see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox" /> 控件中使用的缩进。

trans-unit.source: The number of pixels inserted as the indentation after a bullet.
trans-unit.target: 作为缩进在项目符号后插入的像素数。

trans-unit.source: The default is zero.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为零。

trans-unit.source: To apply the bullet style to a paragraph of text, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.SelectionBullet%2A> property to `true` and then set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.BulletIndent%2A> property to the number of pixels that the text should be indented.
trans-unit.target: 若要将项目符号样式应用于一段文本，将设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.SelectionBullet%2A>属性`true`然后设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.BulletIndent%2A>属性应缩进文本的像素数。

trans-unit.source: The paragraph will have the bullet style applied to it with the specified amount of indentation after the bullet.
trans-unit.target: 段落将具有应用于它与指定的符号后面的缩进量的项目符号样式。

trans-unit.source: This property only affects the current paragraph within the control's text and the currently selected bullet in a list of bulleted items.
trans-unit.target: 此属性仅影响控件的文本和当前所选项目符号列表中的项目符号中的当前段落。

trans-unit.source: To apply a different indentation level to an entire list of bulleted items, all the text of the bulleted items must be selected before setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.BulletIndent%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要将不同的缩进级别应用于整个项目符号列表项的列表中，所有项目符号列表项的文本之前，必须选择设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.BulletIndent%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.SelectionBullet%2A> property with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.BulletIndent%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.SelectionFont%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.SelectedText%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.SelectionColor%2A> properties to create a bulleted list in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox> control.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.SelectionBullet%2A>具有属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.BulletIndent%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.SelectionFont%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.SelectedText%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.SelectionColor%2A>属性以创建中的项目符号列表<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox>控件。

trans-unit.source: This example requires that a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox> control named `richTextBox1` is created on a form.
trans-unit.target: 此示例需要<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox>控件名为`richTextBox1`在窗体上创建。

trans-unit.source: The specified indentation was less than zero.
trans-unit.target: 指定的缩进小于零。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.Format" /> values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.Format" /> 值之一。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether you can paste information from the Clipboard in the specified data format.
trans-unit.target: 确定是否可以粘贴指定数据格式的剪贴板信息。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if you can paste data from the Clipboard in the specified data format; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果可以粘贴指定数据格式的剪贴板数据，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: You can use this method to determine whether the current contents of the Clipboard are in a specified Clipboard data format before enabling the user to paste the information into the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox> control.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用此方法确定是否剪贴板的当前内容中指定的剪贴板数据格式在启用使用者粘贴到的信息之前<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox>控件。

trans-unit.source: For example, you could create an event handler for a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem.Popup> event of a paste command <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem> and use this method to determine whether the paste <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem> should be enabled based on the type of data in the Clipboard.
trans-unit.target: 例如，可以创建的事件处理程序<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem.Popup>粘贴命令事件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem>并使用此方法来确定是否粘贴<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem>基于剪贴板中的数据类型，应启用。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.Paste%2A> method to paste a bitmap into the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox> control.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.Paste%2A>方法以粘贴到位图<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox>控件。

trans-unit.source: After opening a bitmap from file, the example uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard.SetDataObject%2A> method to copy the bitmap to the Windows clipboard.
trans-unit.target: 在从文件中打开一个位图之后, 该示例使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard.SetDataObject%2A>方法以将位图复制到 Windows 剪贴板。

trans-unit.source: Finally, the example retrieves the format for the <xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap> object, uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.CanPaste%2A> method to verify that the format can be pasted into the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox> control, and then uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.Paste%2A> method to paste the data.
trans-unit.target: 最后，该示例将检索的格式<xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap>对象，使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.CanPaste%2A>方法以验证格式可以粘贴到<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox>控件，然后使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.Paste%2A>粘贴数据的方法。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether there are actions that have occurred within the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox" /> that can be reapplied.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，通过该值指示在 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox" /> 内发生的操作中是否有可以重新应用的操作。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if there are operations that have been undone that can be reapplied to the content of the control; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果有已撤消的操作可以重新应用到控件内容，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: You can use this property to determine whether the last operation undone in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox> can be reapplied using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.Redo%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用此属性以确定是否在中撤消的上一个操作<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox>可以使用重新应用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.Redo%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.CanRedo%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.RedoActionName%2A> properties, and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.Redo%2A> method, to restrict a redo operation to any action except the deletion of text.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.CanRedo%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.RedoActionName%2A>属性，与<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.Redo%2A>方法，以限制对除删除文本的任何操作的重做操作。

trans-unit.source: This example requires that you have a form that contains a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox> control and that an operation within the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox> has been performed and undone before the code in this example is called.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether or not the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox" /> will automatically format a Uniform Resource Locator (URL) when it is typed into the control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，通过该值指示当在控件中键入某个统一资源定位器 (URL) 时，<see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox" /> 是否自动设置 URL 的格式。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox" /> will automatically format URLs that are typed into the control as a link; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox" /> 将键入到控件中的 URL 自动设置为链接格式，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: If this property is set to `true`, any text entered into the control that is determined by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox> to be a URL is automatically formatted as a link.
trans-unit.target: 如果此属性设置为`true`，文本框由控件中输入任何文本<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox>要 URL 自动设置为链接的格式。

trans-unit.source: You can create an event handler for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.LinkClicked> event to handle all links clicked in the control.
trans-unit.target: 你可以创建的事件处理程序<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.LinkClicked>事件来处理所有链接在单击控件中。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkClickedEventArgs> that is provided to the event handler for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.LinkClicked> event provides data that enables you to determine which link was clicked in the control in order to process the link.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkClickedEventArgs>到事件处理程序提供<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.LinkClicked>事件提供数据，可用于确定要处理的链接控件中被单击的链接。

trans-unit.source: The following code example contains an event handler for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.LinkClicked> event.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例包含的事件处理程序<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.LinkClicked>事件。

trans-unit.source: The event handler processes link clicks within the document of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox> control and launches an instance of the default browser (using the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Start%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method), displaying the page for the link that was clicked.
trans-unit.target: 事件处理程序处理的文档中的链接单击<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox>控制，并启动默认浏览器的实例 (使用<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Start%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法)，显示被单击的链接的页。

trans-unit.source: This example requires that the event handler has been connected to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.LinkClicked> event for a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox>.
trans-unit.target: 此示例需要事件处理程序已连接到<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.LinkClicked>事件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox>。

trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Bitmap" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" />。

trans-unit.source: This method is not relevant for this class.
trans-unit.target: 此方法与此类无关。

trans-unit.source: This method is not relevant for this class.
trans-unit.target: 此方法与此类无关。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that enables drag-and-drop operations on text, pictures, and other data.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值在文本、图片和其他数据上启用拖放操作。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to enable drag-and-drop operations; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果启用拖放操作，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Searches for text within the contents of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox" />.
trans-unit.target: 在 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox" /> 的内容内搜索文本。

trans-unit.source: The array of characters to search for.
trans-unit.target: 要搜索的字符数组。

trans-unit.source: Searches the text of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox" /> control for the first instance of a character from a list of characters.
trans-unit.target: 在 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox" /> 控件的文本中搜索字符列表中某个字符的第一个实例。

trans-unit.source: The location within the control where the search characters were found or -1 if the search characters are not found or an empty search character set is specified in the <paramref name="char" /> parameter.
trans-unit.target: 在控件中找到搜索字符的位置；如果未找到搜索字符或者在 <paramref name="char" /> 参数中指定了空搜索字符集，则为 -1。

trans-unit.source: This version of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.Find%2A> method searches for the first instance of a character from a list of characters specified in the `characterSet` parameter and returns the location of the character.
trans-unit.target: 此版本的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.Find%2A>方法搜索中指定的字符的列表中的一个字符的第一个实例`characterSet`参数并返回字符的位置。

trans-unit.source: For example, you pass an array of characters containing the character 'Q'.
trans-unit.target: 例如，你将传递字符，其中包含的字符 Q 的数组。

trans-unit.source: If the control contained the text "The Quick Brown Fox", the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.Find%2A> method would return the value of four.
trans-unit.target: 如果控件包含文本"快速 Brown Fox"，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.Find%2A>方法将返回四个值。

trans-unit.source: An upper case character and a lower case character are considered different values in the search.
trans-unit.target: 大写字符和小写字符被视为在搜索中的不同值。

trans-unit.source: If the property returns a negative value, the characters being searched for were not found within the contents of the control.
trans-unit.target: 如果属性返回一个负值，该控件的内容中未找到要搜索的字符。

trans-unit.source: You can use this method to search for a group of characters within the control.
trans-unit.target: 此方法可用于搜索的一组控件内的字符。

trans-unit.source: This version of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.Find%2A> method requires that the entire document contained in the control is searched for the characters.
trans-unit.target: 此版本的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.Find%2A>方法要求在控件中包含的整个文档会搜索的字符。

trans-unit.source: If a character from the character list provided in the method's `characterSet` parameter is found, the value returned by this method is a zero-based index of the character's position in the control.
trans-unit.target: 如果从提供的方法中的字符列表的字符`characterSet`找到的参数，此方法返回的值是在控件中的字符的位置的从零开始索引。

trans-unit.source: A space is considered a character by the method when determining the location of a character.
trans-unit.target: 空间时应考虑字符由方法确定一个字符的位置。

trans-unit.source: The following code example searches the contents of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox> for the characters that are passed to the method in the `text` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例的内容中搜索<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox>传递给方法中的字符有关`text`参数。

trans-unit.source: If the contents of the `text` array are found in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox>, the method returns the index of the value that is found; otherwise, it returns -1.
trans-unit.target: 如果内容`text`数组位于<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox>，该方法返回找到; 否则为值的索引，则返回-1。

trans-unit.source: The example requires that this method is placed in the class of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> that contains a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox> control named `richTextBox1` and a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> control, named `button1`, that is connected to the `Click` event handler defined in the example.
trans-unit.target: 该示例需要此方法所在的类中<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>包含<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox>控件名为`richTextBox1`和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>控件，名为`button1`，即连接到`Click`中定义的事件处理程序该示例。

trans-unit.source: The text to locate in the control.
trans-unit.target: 要在控件中定位的文本。

trans-unit.source: Searches the text in a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox" /> control for a string.
trans-unit.target: 在 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox" /> 控件的文本中搜索字符串。

trans-unit.source: The location within the control where the search text was found or -1 if the search string is not found or an empty search string is specified in the <paramref name="str" /> parameter.
trans-unit.target: 在控件中找到搜索文本的位置；如果未找到搜索字符串或者在 <paramref name="str" /> 参数中指定了空搜索字符串，则为 -1。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.Find%2A> method searches for the text specified in the `str` parameter and returns the location of the first character within the control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.Find%2A>方法搜索中指定的文本`str`参数并返回在控件内的第一个字符的位置。

trans-unit.source: If the property returns a negative value, the text string being searched for was not found within the contents of the control.
trans-unit.target: 如果该属性返回一个负值，该控件的内容中未找到要搜索的文本字符串。

trans-unit.source: You can use this method to create search functionality that can be provided to the user of the control.
trans-unit.target: 此方法可用于创建可以提供给控件的用户的搜索功能。

trans-unit.source: You can also use this method to search for text to be replaced with a specific format.
trans-unit.target: 此方法还可用于搜索文本，以替换为特定的格式。

trans-unit.source: For example, if the user entered dates into the control, you could use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.Find%2A> method to search for all dates in the document and replace them with the appropriate format before using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.SaveFile%2A> method of the control.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果用户文本框控件中输入日期，则无法使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.Find%2A>方法来搜索文档中的所有日期和在使用之前将它们替换为适当的格式<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.SaveFile%2A>的控件的方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.Find%2A> methods that accept a `string` as a parameter cannot find text that is contained on more than one line of text within the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.Find%2A>方法，其接受`string`如参数找不到多个行中的文本包含的文本<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox>。

trans-unit.source: Performing such a search will return a value of negative one (-1).
trans-unit.target: 执行此类的搜索将返回值为负一 (-1)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example searches the entire contents of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox> for the first instance of a search string passed into the text parameter of the method.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例的整个内容中搜索<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox>搜索字符串的第一个实例传递给方法的文本参数。

trans-unit.source: If the search string is found in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox>, the method returns a value of `true` and highlights the search text, otherwise it returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: 如果在中找到的搜索字符串<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox>，该方法返回的值`true`并突出显示搜索文本，否则它将返回`false`。

trans-unit.source: The example requires that this method is placed in the class of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> that contains a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox> named `richTextBox1`.
trans-unit.target: 该示例需要此方法所在的类中<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>包含<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox>名为`richTextBox1`。

trans-unit.source: The array of characters to search for.
trans-unit.target: 要搜索的字符数组。

trans-unit.source: The location within the control's text at which to begin searching.
trans-unit.target: 控件文本中开始搜索的位置。

trans-unit.source: Searches the text of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox" /> control, at a specific starting point, for the first instance of a character from a list of characters.
trans-unit.target: 从特定的起始点开始，在 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox" /> 控件的文本中搜索字符列表中某个字符的第一个实例。

trans-unit.source: The location within the control where the search characters are found.
trans-unit.target: 控件内找到搜索字符的位置。

trans-unit.source: This version of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.Find%2A> method searches for the first instance of a character from a list of characters specified in the `characterSet` parameter and returns the location the character.
trans-unit.target: 此版本的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.Find%2A>方法搜索中指定的字符的列表中的一个字符的第一个实例`characterSet`参数和返回的字符的位置。

trans-unit.source: For example, you pass an array of characters containing the character 'Q'.
trans-unit.target: 例如，你将传递字符，其中包含的字符 Q 的数组。

trans-unit.source: If the control contained the text "The Quick Brown Fox", the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.Find%2A> method would return the value of four.
trans-unit.target: 如果控件包含文本"快速 Brown Fox"，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.Find%2A>方法将返回四个值。

trans-unit.source: An upper case character and a lower case character are considered different values in the search.
trans-unit.target: 大写字符和小写字符被视为在搜索中的不同值。

trans-unit.source: If the property returns a negative value, the characters being searched for were not found within the contents of the control.
trans-unit.target: 如果属性返回一个负值，该控件的内容中未找到要搜索的字符。

trans-unit.source: You can use this method to search for a group of characters within the control.
trans-unit.target: 此方法可用于搜索的一组控件内的字符。

trans-unit.source: If a character from the character list provided in the method's `characterSet` parameter is found, the value returned by this method is a zero-based index of the character's position in the control.
trans-unit.target: 如果从提供的方法中的字符列表的字符`characterSet`找到的参数，此方法返回的值是在控件中的字符的位置的从零开始索引。

trans-unit.source: A space is considered a character by the method when determining the location of a character.
trans-unit.target: 空间时应考虑字符由方法确定一个字符的位置。

trans-unit.source: This version of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.Find%2A> method enables you to search for a character set from a specified start position within the text of the control by specifying a value for the `start` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 此版本的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.Find%2A>方法，您可以通过指定的值设置从控件文本内指定的开始位置的字符搜索`start`参数。

trans-unit.source: A value of zero indicates that the search should start from the beginning of the control's document.
trans-unit.target: 零值指示应从控件的文档的开头搜索。

trans-unit.source: You can use this version of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.Find%2A> method to narrow your search to avoid text that you already know does not contain the specified characters you are searching for or are not important in your search.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用此版本的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.Find%2A>方法以缩小搜索范围以避免你已经知道的文本不包含您要搜索或并不重要在搜索中的指定的字符。

trans-unit.source: The following code example searches the contents of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox> for the characters that are passed to the method in the `text` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例的内容中搜索<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox>传递给方法中的字符有关`text`参数。

trans-unit.source: The search begins from the location within the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox> specified by the `start` parameter of the `FindMyText` method.

trans-unit.source: If the contents of the text array are found in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox>, the method returns the index of the value that is found; otherwise, it returns -1.

trans-unit.source: The example requires that this method is placed in the class of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> that contains a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox> control named `richTextBox1` and a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> control named `button1` that is connected to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click> event handler defined in the example.
trans-unit.target: 该示例需要此方法所在的类中<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>包含<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox>控件名为`richTextBox1`和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>控件名为`button1`的已连接到<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click>中定义的事件处理程序示例。

trans-unit.source: The text to locate in the control.
trans-unit.target: 要在控件中定位的文本。

trans-unit.target: 在对搜索应用特定选项的情况下，在 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox" /> 控件的文本中搜索字符串。

trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.Find%2A>方法搜索中指定的文本`str`参数并返回在控件内的第一个字符的位置。

trans-unit.source: You can use this method to create search functionality that can be provided to the user of the control.
trans-unit.target: 此方法可用于创建可以提供给控件的用户的搜索功能。

trans-unit.source: You can also use this method to search for text to be replaced with a specific format.
trans-unit.target: 此方法还可用于搜索文本，以替换为特定的格式。

trans-unit.source: For example, if the user entered dates into the control, you can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.Find%2A> method to search for all dates in the document and replace them with the appropriate format before using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.SaveFile%2A> method of the control.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果用户文本框控件中输入日期，则可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.Find%2A>方法来搜索文档中的所有日期和在使用之前将它们替换为适当的格式<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.SaveFile%2A>的控件的方法。

trans-unit.source: With this version of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.Find%2A> method, you can specify options that enable you to expand or narrow your search.
trans-unit.target: 与此版本的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.Find%2A>方法，你可以指定选项，使你可以展开或缩小搜索范围。

trans-unit.source: You can specify options that enable you to match the casing of the search word or to search for entire words instead of partial words.
trans-unit.target: 你可以指定允许你以匹配的大小写的搜索词或完整的字词，而不是部分单词搜索选项。

trans-unit.source: By specifying the `RichTextBoxFinds.Reverse` enumeration in the `options` parameter, you can search for text from the bottom of the document to the top instead of the default top to bottom search method.
trans-unit.target: 通过指定`RichTextBoxFinds.Reverse`中的枚举`options`参数，你可以搜索文本从文档底部到顶部，而不是默认顶部到底部搜索方法。

trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.Find%2A>方法，其接受`string`如参数找不到多个行中的文本包含的文本<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox>。

trans-unit.source: This value must be equal to negative one (-1) or greater than or equal to the <c>start</c> parameter.
trans-unit.target: 此值必须等于 -1 或者大于或等于 <c>start</c> 参数。

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBoxFinds" /> values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBoxFinds" /> 值的按位组合。

trans-unit.source: Searches the text in a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox" /> control for a string within a range of text within the control and with specific options applied to the search.
trans-unit.target: 在对搜索应用特定选项的情况下，在 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox" /> 控件文本中搜索控件内某个文本范围内的字符串。

trans-unit.source: The location within the control where the search text was found.
trans-unit.target: 控件内找到搜索文本的位置。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.Find%2A> method searches for the text specified in the `str` parameter and returns the location of the first character of the search string within the control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.Find%2A>方法搜索中指定的文本`str`参数并返回在控件内的字符串的搜索的第一个字符的位置。

trans-unit.source: If the property returns a negative value, the text string being searched for was not found within the contents of the control.
trans-unit.target: 如果该属性返回一个负值，该控件的内容中未找到要搜索的文本字符串。

trans-unit.source: You can use this method to create search functionality that can be provided to the user of the control.
trans-unit.target: 此方法可用于创建可以提供给控件的用户的搜索功能。

trans-unit.source: You can also use this method to search for text to be replaced with a specific format.
trans-unit.target: 此方法还可用于搜索文本，以替换为特定的格式。

trans-unit.source: For example, if the user entered dates into the control, you can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.Find%2A> method to search for all dates in the document and replace them with the appropriate format before using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.SaveFile%2A> method of the control.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果用户文本框控件中输入日期，则可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.Find%2A>方法来搜索文档中的所有日期和在使用之前将它们替换为适当的格式<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.SaveFile%2A>的控件的方法。

trans-unit.source: With this version of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.Find%2A> method, you can specify options that enable you to expand or narrow your search.
trans-unit.target: 与此版本的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.Find%2A>方法，你可以指定选项，使你可以展开或缩小搜索范围。

trans-unit.source: You can specify options that enable you to match the casing of the search word or to search for entire words instead of partial words.
trans-unit.target: 你可以指定允许你以匹配的大小写的搜索词或完整的字词，而不是部分单词搜索选项。

trans-unit.source: By specifying the `RichTextBoxFinds.Reverse` enumeration in the `options` parameter, you can search for text from the bottom of the document to the top instead of the default top to bottom search method.
trans-unit.target: 通过指定`RichTextBoxFinds.Reverse`中的枚举`options`参数，你可以搜索文本从文档底部到顶部，而不是默认顶部到底部搜索方法。

trans-unit.source: This version of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.Find%2A> method also enables you to narrow the search for text by selecting a specific start and end position within the control's text.
trans-unit.target: 此版本的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.Find%2A>方法还可以通过选择控件的文本内的特定开始和结束位置来缩小搜索的文本。

trans-unit.source: This feature can enable you to limit the search range to a specific section of the control's text.
trans-unit.target: 此功能可以启用你限制到特定的控件的文本段的搜索范围。

trans-unit.source: If a value of negative one (-1) is assigned to the `end` parameter, the method will search until the end of the text in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox> for normal searches.
trans-unit.target: 如果值为负一 (-1) 分配给`end`参数，该方法将搜索中的文本的结束之前一直<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox>正常搜索。

trans-unit.source: For reverse searches, a value of negative one (-1) assigned to the `end` parameter indicates that text will be searched from the end of text (bottom) to the position defined by `start` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 对于反向搜索，值为负一 (-1) 分配给`end`参数指示将定义的位置到从文本 （底端） 末尾搜索文本`start`参数。

trans-unit.source: When the `start` and `end` parameters are provided the same value the entire control is searched for normal searches.
trans-unit.target: 当`start`和`end`的参数提供相同的值整个控件搜索正常搜索。

trans-unit.source: For a reverse search, the entire control is searched but the search begins at the bottom of the document and searches to the top of the document.
trans-unit.target: 对于反向搜索时，搜索整个控件，但搜索文档底部开始，一直搜索到文档顶部。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.Find%2A> methods that accept a `string` as a parameter cannot find text that is contained on more than one line of text within the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.Find%2A>方法，其接受`string`如参数找不到多个行中的文本包含的文本<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox>。

trans-unit.source: Performing such a search will return a value of negative one (-1).
trans-unit.target: 执行此类的搜索将返回值为负一 (-1)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example searches a section of text in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox> for the first instance of a search string passed into the `searchText` parameter of the method.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例中的文本段中搜索<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox>的搜索字符串的第一个实例传递给`searchText`的方法参数。

trans-unit.source: The range to search for text within the control is specified by the `searchStart` and `searchEnd` parameters of the method.
trans-unit.target: 要搜索为指定控件中的文本范围`searchStart`和`searchEnd`方法参数。

trans-unit.source: If the search string is found in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox>, the method returns the index location of the first character of the found text and highlights the found text; otherwise, it returns a value of -1.
trans-unit.target: 如果在中找到的搜索字符串<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox>，该方法返回找到的文本的第一个字符的索引位置，并突出显示找到的文本; 否则，它将返回值-1。

trans-unit.source: The example also uses the `options` parameter of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.Find%2A> method to specify that the found text should match the case of the search string.
trans-unit.target: 此示例还使用`options`参数<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.Find%2A>方法，以指定找到的文本应匹配的搜索字符串的大小写。

trans-unit.source: The example requires that this method is placed in the class of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> that contains a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox> control named `richTextBox1`.
trans-unit.target: 该示例需要此方法所在的类中<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>包含<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox>控件名为`richTextBox1`。

trans-unit.source: After the first instance of the search string has been found, you can use this example to find other instances in the text.
trans-unit.target: 在第一个之后的搜索字符串的实例已找到，您可以使用此示例在文本中找到其他实例。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="str" /> parameter was <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="str" /> 参数是 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="end" /> parameter was less the <paramref name="start" /> parameter.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="end" /> 参数小于 <paramref name="start" /> 参数。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the font of the text displayed by the control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置控件显示的文字的字体。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Font" /> to apply to the text displayed by the control.
trans-unit.target: 要应用于由控件显示的文本的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Font" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is the value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DefaultFont" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 默认为 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DefaultFont" /> 属性的值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the foreground color of the control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置控件的前景色。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> that represents the control's foreground color.
trans-unit.target: 表示控件前景色的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" />。

trans-unit.source: The location to search.
trans-unit.target: 要搜索的位置。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the index of the character nearest to the specified location.
trans-unit.target: 检索距离指定位置最近的字符索引。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based character index at the specified location.
trans-unit.target: 位于指定位置的从零开始的字符索引。

trans-unit.source: This method returns the character index that is closest to the position specified in the `pt` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 此方法返回与指定的位置最接近的字符索引`pt`参数。

trans-unit.source: The character index is a zero-based index of text in the control, including spaces.
trans-unit.target: 字符索引是文本的在控件中，包括空格中的从零开始索引。

trans-unit.source: You can use this method to determine where in the text the user has the mouse over by passing the mouse coordinates to this method.
trans-unit.target: 此方法可用于确定在文本中用户在其上将鼠标放将鼠标坐标传递给此方法。

trans-unit.source: This can be useful if you want to perform tasks when the user rests the mouse pointer over a word in the text of the control.
trans-unit.target: 这很有用，如果你想要在用户将鼠标指针停留在该控件的文本中的单词时执行任务。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.GetCharIndexFromPosition%2A> method with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.Find%2A> method to search for a specific string within a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox> control and display the character index where the found string is located within the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox> control.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.GetCharIndexFromPosition%2A>方法替换<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.Find%2A>方法搜索特定字符串在<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox>控件，并显示找到的字符串所在的位置中的字符索引<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox>控件。

trans-unit.source: The example searches for the word "brown" within the contents of the control and returns the character index position where the search string is found.
trans-unit.target: 示例搜索单词"brown"控件的内容中，并返回找到的搜索字符串的字符索引位置。

trans-unit.source: This example requires that you have a form that contains a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox> control named `richTextBox1` that contains text.
trans-unit.target: 此示例要求你拥有一个包含窗体<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox>控件名为`richTextBox1`包含文本。

trans-unit.source: It also requires that the code in the example is connected to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseDown> event of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox>.
trans-unit.target: 它还要求该示例中的代码已连接到<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseDown>事件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox>。

trans-unit.source: The character index position to search.
trans-unit.target: 要搜索的字符索引位置。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the line number from the specified character position within the text of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 从 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox" /> 控件文本内的指定字符位置检索行号。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based line number in which the character index is located.
trans-unit.target: 字符索引所在的从零开始的行号。

trans-unit.source: This method enables you to determine the line number based on the character index specified in the `index` parameter of the method.
trans-unit.target: 此方法可用于确定基于中指定的字符索引的行号`index`的方法参数。

trans-unit.source: The first line of text in the control returns the value zero.
trans-unit.target: 控件中的文本的第一行返回值零。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.GetLineFromCharIndex%2A> method returns the physical line number where the indexed character is located within the control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.GetLineFromCharIndex%2A>方法返回的物理行号的索引的字符所在的位置在控件内。

trans-unit.source: For example, if a portion of the first logical line of text in the control wraps to the next line, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.GetLineFromCharIndex%2A> method returns 1 if the character at the specified character index has wrapped to the second physical line.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果第一个逻辑行中的文本的一部分控件换行到下一行，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.GetLineFromCharIndex%2A>方法返回 1，如果指定的字符索引处的字符已经换行到第二个物理行。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.WordWrap%2A> is set to `false`, no portion of the line wraps to the next, and the method returns 0 for the specified character index.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.WordWrap%2A>设置为`false`、 行的任何部分被换到下一行，并且该方法返回对指定的字符索引为 0。

trans-unit.source: You can use this method to determine which line a specific character index is located within.
trans-unit.target: 此方法可用于确定哪一行是位于特定的字符索引。

trans-unit.source: For example, after calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.Find%2A> method to search for text, you can obtain the character index to where the search results are found.
trans-unit.target: 例如，在调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.Find%2A>方法来搜索的文本，你可以获取到找到搜索结果的字符索引。

trans-unit.source: You can call this method with the character index returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.Find%2A> method to determine which line the word was found.
trans-unit.target: 你可以调用此方法返回的字符索引与<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.Find%2A>找不到方法，以确定其行单词。

trans-unit.source: In certain cases, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.GetLineFromCharIndex%2A> does not throw an exception when the `index` parameter is an invalid value.
trans-unit.target: 在某些情况下，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.GetLineFromCharIndex%2A>不会引发异常时`index`参数是无效值。

trans-unit.source: For example:
trans-unit.target: 例如:

trans-unit.source: If the `index` parameter is <xref:System.Int32.MinValue> or -1, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.GetLineFromCharIndex%2A> returns 0.
trans-unit.target: 如果`index`参数是<xref:System.Int32.MinValue>或-1，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.GetLineFromCharIndex%2A>返回 0。

trans-unit.source: If the `index` parameter is the text length or <xref:System.Int32.MaxValue>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.GetLineFromCharIndex%2A> returns the number of the last line of text, which is not necessarily the same as `Lines.Length-1`, depending on the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.WordWrap%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 如果`index`参数是文本长度或<xref:System.Int32.MaxValue>，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.GetLineFromCharIndex%2A>返回的最后一行文本，并不一定相同数作为`Lines.Length-1`，具体的值取决于<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.WordWrap%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: In these cases, validate the input before calling <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.GetLineFromCharIndex%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 在这些情况下，验证之前调用的输入<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.GetLineFromCharIndex%2A>。

trans-unit.source: If the character index specified in the `index` parameter is beyond the available number of lines contained within the control, the last line number is returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果在中指定的字符索引`index`参数为超出可用的控件内包含的行数，则返回最后一个行号。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.GetLineFromCharIndex%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.GetLineFromCharIndex%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: To run the example, paste the following code in a form containing a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox> control named `RichTextBox1`, a button named `Button1` and two text boxes named `TextBox1` and `TextBox2`.
trans-unit.target: 若要运行该示例，请将以下代码粘贴在窗体包含<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox>控件名为`RichTextBox1`，名为的按钮`Button1`和名为的两个文本框`TextBox1`和`TextBox2`。

trans-unit.source: When the example is running, enter a search string in `TextBox2` and click the button to get search results.
trans-unit.target: 当运行示例时，输入中的搜索字符串`TextBox2`单击该按钮以获取搜索结果。

trans-unit.source: The index of the character for which to retrieve the location.
trans-unit.target: 要检索其位置的字符索引。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the location within the control at the specified character index.
trans-unit.target: 检索控件内指定字符索引处的位置。

trans-unit.source: The location of the specified character.
trans-unit.target: 指定字符的位置。

trans-unit.source: This method enables you to determine where in the control a specific character index is located.
trans-unit.target: 此方法可确定在控件中特定的字符索引所在的位置。

trans-unit.source: You can use this method for such tasks as displaying shortcut menu items or help information for a word in the control.
trans-unit.target: 此方法可用于任务，如在控件中显示快捷菜单项或帮助信息的单词。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you wanted to display a menu of options to the user when the user right clicks on a word in the control, you can use this method to determine the position of the word to properly display a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenu> control.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果你想要向用户显示的菜单选项，当用户右键单击控件中的单词上，你可以使用此方法来确定单词以正确显示的位置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenu>控件。

trans-unit.source: Occurs during a drag operation.
trans-unit.target: 在执行拖动操作期间发生。

trans-unit.source: This event is not relevant to this class.
trans-unit.target: 此事件与此类无关。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the user clicks the horizontal scroll bar of the control.
trans-unit.target: 当用户单击控件的水平滚动条时发生。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.target: 在示例中，事件处理程序报告的匹配项<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.HScroll>事件。

trans-unit.source: This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging.

trans-unit.source: To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> with <xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or appending the message to a multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.

trans-unit.target: 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到包含类型的实例的项目<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox>名为`RichTextBox1`。

trans-unit.source: This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging.
trans-unit.target: 此报告可帮助您了解当发生事件，并可以帮助您进行调试。

trans-unit.target: 若要报告或频繁发生的事件上多个事件，请考虑替换<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>与<xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>或追加到一个多行消息<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>。

trans-unit.target: 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到包含类型的实例的项目<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox>名为`RichTextBox1`。

trans-unit.target: 然后，确保与事件处理程序<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.ImeChange>事件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox" /> settings for Input Method Editor (IME) and Asian language support.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示输入法编辑器 (IME) 和亚洲语言支持的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox" /> 设置。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBoxLanguageOptions" /> values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBoxLanguageOptions" /> 值之一。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBoxLanguageOptions.AutoFontSizeAdjust" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBoxLanguageOptions.AutoFontSizeAdjust" />。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the user clicks on a link within the text of the control.
trans-unit.target: 当用户在控件文本内的链接上单击时发生。

trans-unit.source: You can create an event handler for this event to process a link that has been clicked within the control.
trans-unit.target: 你可以创建的事件处理程序处理已单击控件内的链接此事件。

trans-unit.source: Using the information provided to the event handler, you can determine which link was clicked in the document.
trans-unit.target: 使用提供给事件处理程序的信息，你可以确定文档中被单击的链接。

trans-unit.source: By default, links are displayed as text and are not clickable.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，显示为文本与不是可单击的链接。

trans-unit.source: To make them clickable set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.DetectUrls%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 要使它们可单击组<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.DetectUrls%2A>属性`true`。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example contains an event handler for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.LinkClicked> event.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例包含的事件处理程序<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.LinkClicked>事件。

trans-unit.source: The event handler processes link clicks within the document of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox> control and launches an instance of the default browser (using the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Start%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method), displaying the page for the link that was clicked.
trans-unit.target: 事件处理程序处理的文档中的链接单击<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox>控制，并启动默认浏览器的实例 (使用<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Start%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法)，显示被单击的链接的页。

trans-unit.source: This example requires that the event handler has been connected to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.LinkClicked> event for a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox>.
trans-unit.target: 此示例需要事件处理程序已连接到<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.LinkClicked>事件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox>。

trans-unit.source: Loads the contents of a file into the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 将文件的内容加载到 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox" /> 控件中。

trans-unit.source: The name and location of the file to load into the control.
trans-unit.target: 要加载到控件中的文件的名称和位置。

trans-unit.source: Loads a rich text format (RTF) or standard ASCII text file into the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 将 RTF 格式文件或标准 ASCII 文本文件加载到 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox" /> 控件中。

trans-unit.source: When loading a file with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.LoadFile%2A> method, the contents of the file being loaded replace the entire contents of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox> control.
trans-unit.target: 加载的文件时<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.LoadFile%2A>方法，所加载的文件的内容替换的全部内容<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox>控件。

trans-unit.source: This will cause the values of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.Text%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.Rtf%2A> properties to change.
trans-unit.target: 这将导致的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.Text%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.Rtf%2A>属性来更改。

trans-unit.source: You can use this method to load a previously created text or RTF document into the control for manipulation.
trans-unit.target: 此方法可用于将以前创建的文本或 RTF 文档加载到操作的控件。

trans-unit.source: If you want to save the file, you can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.SaveFile%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 如果你想要保存该文件，则可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.SaveFile%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: With this version of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.LoadFile%2A> method, if the file being loaded is not an RTF document, an exception will occur.
trans-unit.target: 与此版本的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.LoadFile%2A>方法，如果正在加载该文件不是一个 RTF 文档中，将发生异常。

trans-unit.source: To load a different type of file such as an ASCII text file, use the other versions of this method that accept a value from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBoxStreamType> enumeration as a parameter.
trans-unit.target: 若要加载不同类型的文件，如 ASCII 文本文件，请使用此方法接受从值的其他版本<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBoxStreamType>枚举作为参数。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.LoadFile%2A> method will not open a file until a handle is created for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.LoadFile%2A>方法将不会打开一个文件，直到为创建句柄<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox>。

trans-unit.source: Ensure that the control's handle is created before calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.LoadFile%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 确保控件的句柄创建，然后再调<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.LoadFile%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The following code example opens an RTF file into the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox> control.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例将打开到 RTF 文件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox>控件。

trans-unit.source: The example uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.OpenFileDialog> class to display a dialog to request the file from the user.
trans-unit.target: 该示例使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.OpenFileDialog>类以显示对话框以请求用户文件。

trans-unit.source: The code then loads that file assuming that it is an RTF document file.
trans-unit.target: 代码接着加载此文件假定它是 RTF 文档文件。

trans-unit.source: If the file is not, the example code will throw an exception.
trans-unit.target: 如果文件不是，该示例代码将引发异常。

trans-unit.source: This example requires that the code is placed in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> class that has a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox> control named `richTextBox1`.
trans-unit.target: 此示例需要将代码置于中<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>具有类<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox>控件名为`richTextBox1`。

trans-unit.source: An error occurred while loading the file into the control.
trans-unit.target: 将文件加载到控件中时出现错误。

trans-unit.source: The file being loaded is not an RTF document.
trans-unit.target: 所加载的文件不是 RTF 文档。

trans-unit.source: for opening a file.
trans-unit.target: 用于打开文件。

trans-unit.target: 将现有数据流的内容加载到 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox" /> 控件中。

trans-unit.source: You can use this version of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.LoadFile%2A> method to load the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox> with data from an existing stream of data.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用此版本的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.LoadFile%2A>方法以加载<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox>数据的现有流中的数据。

trans-unit.source: The data that is loaded into the control replaces the entire contents of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox> control.
trans-unit.target: 加载到控件的数据的整个内容替换<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox>控件。

trans-unit.source: This will cause the values of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.Text%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.Rtf%2A> properties to change.
trans-unit.target: 这将导致的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.Text%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.Rtf%2A>属性来更改。

trans-unit.source: You can use this method to load a file that has been previously opened into a data stream into the control for manipulation.
trans-unit.target: 此方法可用于已打开的文件加载到数据流到操作的控件。

trans-unit.source: If you want to save contents of the control back into the stream, you can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.SaveFile%2A> method that accepts a <xref:System.IO.Stream> object as a parameter.
trans-unit.target: 如果你想要将控件内容保存到流中，你可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.SaveFile%2A>方法接受<xref:System.IO.Stream>对象作为参数。

trans-unit.source: This version of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.LoadFile%2A> method also enables you to specify the type of data that is being loaded into the control.
trans-unit.target: 此版本的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.LoadFile%2A>方法还使您可以指定要加载到控件的数据的类型。

trans-unit.source: This feature enables you to use data streams that contain data other than rich text format (RTF) documents into the control.
trans-unit.target: 此功能，可使用到控件包含丰富文本格式 (RTF) 的文档以外的数据的数据流。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.LoadFile%2A> method will not open a file until a handle is created for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.LoadFile%2A>方法将不会打开一个文件，直到为创建句柄<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox>。

trans-unit.source: Ensure that the control's handle is created before calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.LoadFile%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 确保控件的句柄创建，然后再调<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.LoadFile%2A>方法。

trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.SaveFile%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.LoadFile%2A>与流的方法。

trans-unit.target: 它还演示如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.FileDialog.FileName%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FileDialog.DefaultExt%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SaveFileDialog.CreatePrompt%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SaveFileDialog.OverwritePrompt%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>成员。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the maximum number of characters the user can type or paste into the rich text box control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置用户可在多格式文本框控件中键入或粘贴的最大字符数。

trans-unit.source: The number of characters that can be entered into the control.
trans-unit.target: 可以在文本框控件中输入的字符数。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="F:System.Int32.MaxValue" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see cref="F:System.Int32.MaxValue" />。

trans-unit.source: When this property is set to 0, the maximum length of the text that can be entered in the control is 64 KB of characters.
trans-unit.target: 当此属性设置为 0 时，则可以在控件中输入的最大长度是文本的 64 KB 的字符。

trans-unit.source: This property is typically used when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox> is used to display a single line of rich text format (RTF) text.
trans-unit.target: 此属性通常是时使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox>用于显示单个丰富文本格式 (RTF) 文本行。

trans-unit.source: You can use this property to restrict the length of text entered in the control for values such as postal codes and telephone numbers, or to restrict the length of text entered when the data is to be entered in a database.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用此属性，以限制为如邮政编码和电话号码的值输入控件中的文本的长度或将输入数据时要输入在数据库中的文本的长度限制。

trans-unit.source: You can limit the text entered into the control to the maximum length of the corresponding field in the database.
trans-unit.target: 你可以限制到数据库中的对应字段的最大长度文本框控件中输入的文本。

trans-unit.source: In code, you can set the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.Text%2A> property to a value that has a length greater than the value specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.MaxLength%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 在代码中，你可以设置的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.Text%2A>属性的长度大于指定的值的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.MaxLength%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: This property only affects text entered into the control at run time.
trans-unit.target: 此属性仅影响在运行时文本框控件中输入的文本。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.MaxLength%2A> property to determine if text being assigned to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox> control is larger than the value assigned to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.MaxLength%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.MaxLength%2A>属性来确定如果文本分配给<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox>控件大于分配给值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.MaxLength%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: If the text is not larger, the example uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.SelectedText%2A> property to assign the text to the control.
trans-unit.target: 如果文本不是更大的该示例使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.SelectedText%2A>要分配给控件的文本属性。

trans-unit.target: 分配给属性的值小于零。

trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示此控件是否为多行 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox" /> 控件。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the control is a multiline <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox" /> control; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果该控件是多行 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox" /> 控件，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: 包含事件数据的 <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" />。

trans-unit.target: 引发 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.ContentsResized" /> 事件。

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。
